title: Snowed In With Him
description: Barnes & Noble BESTSELLERPaperbacks available via my websiteAnother night out on the town in New York City with my roommate, what could go wrong? Waking up in a strange bed, stranding me with the bar's known player after a major snowstorm would do it.What's a girl to do when we're snowed in for several days?  What's a girl to do when I start falling for the player?  What should I do when I'm unsure of which girl I am is of the many romance stories I narrate for a living?  Am I the girl being played before the guy finds his true love?  Or, am I the girl who gets the guy?"I feel like I’m in the middle of my own twisted, real-life romance story but I’m too scared to know the outcome.  Which girl am I?  Am I the girl being played who ends up with her heart broken?  Or, am I the girl who gets the guy?"(Note: I'm the older sister of Harper from the short story One Kiss that was featured in the Because Beards anthology.)
author: Martha Sweeney
